c74object.name: sdt.dcmotor~
c74object.description: sdt.dcmotor~ simulates a DC brushed motor. It takes several control parameters, reflecting the main mechanical components that affect sound production: essentially the rotor speed (RPM), the friction noise due to contacts between the brushes and the commutator, the gearing system, and the air movement induced by rotations.

objarg.name: Buffer-size
objarg.digest: Buffer size of the internal comb filter, in samples.
objarg.description: Buffer size of the internal comb filter, in samples. Defaults to 44100, which allows for a maximum chassis length of ca. 343 m at 44.1 kHz sampling rate.

method.name: signal
method.digest:
Inlet 0: Revolutions Per Minute (RPM).
Inlet 1: Mechanical load on the rotor [0., 1.].

attribute.name: coils
attribute.digest: Number of coils on the rotor.

attribute.name: size
attribute.description: Chassis length (m). A buffer size of 44100 allows for a maximum chassis length of âˆ¼343 m at a sampling rate of 44.1 kHz.

attribute.name: rotorGain
attribute.digest: Amount of noise generated by the rotor [0., 1.].

attribute.name: brushGain
attribute.digest: Amount of noise generated by the brushes [0., 1.].

attribute.name: gearGain
attribute.digest: Amount of noise generated by the gears [0., 1.].

attribute.name: airGain
attribute.digest: Amount of air turbulence caused by the spinning rotor [0., 1.].
